Event.name: Cause_to_be_included
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> makes a <fen>New_member</fen> part of <fen>Group</fen>. The <fen>Group</fen> may be represented by an individual <fen>Existing_member</fen> if it implies the existence of a set of members.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>added</t> <fex name="New_member">a new rock</fex> <fex name="Group">to my collection</fex>.</ex> <ex>He decided he needed to <t>add</t> <fex name="New_member">a red tie</fex> <fex name="Existing_member">to the blue tie in his closet.</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is a volitional animate being who causes the <fen>New_member</fen> to become part of the <fen>Group</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Matt</fex> seems to <t>add</t> new work to his flickr most days.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Existing_member
Arg.definition: <def-root>Something that is already a member of the <fen>Group</fen> and represents the <fen>Group</fen> as a whole.</def-root>

Arg.name: New_member
Arg.definition: <def-root>An item that becomes a part of the <fen>Group</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Group
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Group</fen> is anything that can be conceptualized as a complex collection of parts or ingredients, including through metonymy like containers or locations, which <fen>New_member</fen>s can join. <ex>The company<t>includes</t> <fex name="New_member">philanthropic endeavors</fex> in their accomplishments</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Cause
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that is responsible for causing a <fen>New_member</fen> to enter a <fen>Group</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Cause">The calls of crows</fex> <t>added</t> an eerie aspect to the atmosphere of our date.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An intentional action performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that accomplishes the inclusion of a <fen>New_member</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies when the inclusion of the <fen>New_member</fen> to the <fen>Group</fen> occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies what the <fen>Agent</fen> hopes to accomplish by including a <fen>New_member</fen> to a <fen>Group</fen>.
<ex><t>Add</t> a few pinches of pepper to the mixture <fex name="Purpose">to get the best flavor</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location in which a <fen>New_member</fen> is entered into a pre-existing <fen>Group</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: include.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to place into an existing aggregate or group
